variants.Description in input context: This variant affects the function of the protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293-hHtt cell line expressing the mutated Huntingtin protein.

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression level was significantly reduced for the variant NM_015532.4:c.217A>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% in western blot.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% in western blot.
